text:
Hi everyone, first post here! I’m a dev and need to do some graphic changes to existing landing and blog templates. I’ve already set up my local copy and everything seems to work changing CSS files.
Question is this: I see al templates are json files with horrible html embedded in it, is there any easier way to modify the html structure? some editor or something?

Also: do you suggest I work on the actual files or duplicate everything (maybe cleaner, but I’ll have to modify the paths of all the included sections -like header footer etc… )?

Any suggestions welcome! thanks
Sounds to me you are using the old Template System.
If Possible Convert them to HTML + Hubl
If not then you need to edit them in the design manager

thank you! not possible to convert. i dont’ know how to do it and i need to do this in the shortest amount of time. I’m just updating the logo and some colors, but wanted to do some small edits in the html
